bcherb2/ffdash

Terminal dashboard for batch video encoding over SSH

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Executes FFmpeg commands remotely via SSH
  • Chromium browser in your terminal, runs fast, supports video and SSH
  • Converts video formats in batches on macOS
  • Web UI for generating FFmpeg commands
  • Library for encoding and decoding CBOR and CBOR Sequences
  • Trims and edits videos in a browser using ffmpeg.wasm
  • Frontend for ffmpeg video clipping
  • GUI for H.264, HEVC and AV1 encoding
  • Safe Rust interface for FFmpeg integration
